line.text:
Delays
Posted: 02/21/2015 1:24PM
Following an earlier incident at 219 St, [2] train service has resumed with residual delays.
Delays
Posted: 02/21/2015 12:04PM
Due to signal problems at 215 St, southbound [1] trains are running with delays.
Allow additional travel time.

a.b: [6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains run express from Parkchester to Hunts Point Av

text.div:
Weekends, 6:45 AM Sat to 7 PM Sun, until Mar 1
For service to St Lawrence Av, Morrison Av-Soundview, Elder and Whitlock Avs, take the [6] to Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].
For service from these stations, take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

a.b: [5] No trains between Grand Central-42 St and Bowling Green

text.div:
[4] [6] and [R] trains provide alternate service Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Feb 21 - 22
[5] service operates every 20 minutes between Dyre Av and Grand Central-42 St. • Downtown trains make local stops from 125 St to Grand Central-42 St.
Travel Alternatives[TP]
For 14 St-Union Sq and Brooklyn Bridge, take the [4] [6].
For Fulton St, Wall St and Bowling Green, use nearby [R] stations at Cortlandt St, Rector St and Whitehall St.
• Transfer between [5] and [R] trains at 59 St. • Transfer between [5] and [4] [6] trains at Grand Central-42 St. • Transfer between [4] [6] and [R] trains at Canal St.
Note: No [4] service between Brooklyn Bridge and New Lots Av.
[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planningyour trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

a.b:
[4] No trains between Brooklyn Bridge and New Lots Av
[2] [3] [D] [N] [Q] [R] trains provide alternate service

text.div:
Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23 • Feb 27 - Mar 2
[4] service operates between Woodlawn and Brooklyn Bridge, making local stops.
Late Night [3] service is extended to New Lots Av.
Travel Alternatives[TP] For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [D] or [Q].
For Lower Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn, take the [2] [3] or [N] [R].
For service between Borough Hall and Franklin Av, take the [2] [3]. Take the [3] between Franklin Av and New Lots Av.
[4] StationNearby [R] Station Nearby [2] [3] Station
Brooklyn Bridge City HallPark Place
Fulton St [ad] Cortlandt St [ad] Fulton St [ad]
Wall StRector StWall St
Bowling Green [ad]Whitehall St-South Ferry [1] —
Borough HallCourt St orJay St-MetroTech [ad] [A] [C] [F] Borough Hall [ad]
Nevins StDeKalb Av [ad] [Q]Nevins St
Key Transfer Stations
Bleecker St/B'way-Lafayette St [ad][4] and [D] [F]
14 St-Union Sq [ad] or Canal St[4] and [N] [Q] [R]
Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [ad][4] and [2] [3] [D] [N] [Q] [R] Note: No Weekend [5] service between Grand Central-42 St and Bowling Green.
Reminder: Late Night Service at these [R] stations is provided by the [N].
[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planningyour trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

text.P: Due to aÂ rail conditionÂ at Cathedral Pkwy-110 St, northbound [A] and [D] trains are running local from 59 St-Columbus CircleÂ to 125 St.Â
Due to track maintenance between Jackson Hts-Roosevelt AvÂ and Forest Hills-71 Av,Â [E], [F] and [R] trains are running with delays in both directions.

a.b: [E] Jamaica Center-bound trains run local from Roosevelt Av to 71 Av

text.div:
Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Feb 21 - 23
Trains stop at Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.
• Please allow additional travel time.

a.b: [E] Jamaica Center-bound trains skip Spring St and 23 St

text.div:
Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23
For service to these stations, take the [E] to W 4 St or 34 St and transfer to a downtown [A] local, [C] or [E].
For service from these stations, take the [A] [C] or [E] to 14 St or Canal St and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E].

a.b:
[C] 168 St-bound trains run via the [F] from Jay St-MetroTech to 34 St-Herald Sq,
then via the [D] to 59 St-Columbus Circle

text.div:
Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Feb 21 - 22
No 168 St-bound service at High, Fulton, Chambers, Canal, Spring, 14, 23, 34, 42 and 50 Sts.
Travel Alternatives
For High, Fulton, Chambers, Canal 14, 34, and 42 Sts, take the [A] via transfer at Jay St-MetroTech or 59 St-Columbus Circle.
For service to Spring St, take the [C] to W 4 St and transfer to a downtown [C] or [E].
For service from this station*, take the [C] or [E] to Canal St and transfer to an uptown [A] to 59 St-Columbus Circle where [C] service is available.
For service to 23 St, take the [C] to the 7 Av [D] [E] Station and transfer to a downtown [E].
For service from this station*, take the [C] or [E] to 14 St and transfer to an uptown [A] to 59 St where [C] service is available.
For 50 St, take the [E]. Transfer between trains at W 4 St or 7 Av.
*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
Alternate travel note: For 14, 23, 34, 42 and 50 Sts, use nearby [F] stations on 6 Av instead.

a.b:
[A] No trains between Rockaway Blvd and Lefferts Blvd
[A] Howard Beach/Far Rockaway-bound trains skip 88 St

text.div:
[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23
[A] service operates between 207 St and Howard Beach-JFK Airport/Mott Av.
[SB] buses make all stops between 80 St and Lefferts Blvd.
• Transfer between trains and buses at 80 St.
Show Shuttle Bus Stops
StationShuttle Bus Stop
80 St [A]Liberty Av at 80 St
88 St [A] (Inwood-bound only)Liberty Av at 88 St
Rockaway Blvd [A] (Inwood-bound only)93 St at Liberty Av (to Lefferts Blvd)
Liberty Av at 93 St (to 80 St)
104 StLiberty Av at 104 St
111 StLiberty Av at 111 St
Lefferts BlvdLefferts Blvd at Liberty Av Note: The Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound platform at Rockaway Blvd is closed for renovation.
Alternate travel note: For service to 88 St and Rockaway Blvd, take the [A] to Aqueduct-North Conduit Av and transfer to an Inwood-bound [A]. For service toward the Rockaways from these stations, take the [A] to 80 St and transfer to a Howard Beach/Far Rockaway-bound [A].

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Delays
Posted: 02/21/2015 1:22PM
Following an earlier incident at 4 Av-9 St, [F] train service has resumed with residual delays.
Service Change
Posted: 02/21/2015 12:24PM
Due to aÂ rail conditionÂ at Cathedral Pkwy-110 St, northbound [A] and [D] trains are running local from 59 St-Columbus CircleÂ to 125 St.Â
Expect delays on northbound [C] trains.
Allow additional travel time.
Delays
Posted: 02/21/2015 12:02PM
Due to signal problems at 36 St, northbound [D] trains are running with delays.
Allow additional travel time.
Delays
Posted: 02/21/2015 12:01PM
Due to track maintenance between Jackson Hts-Roosevelt AvÂ and Forest Hills-71 Av,Â [E], [F] and [R] trains are running with delays in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains run local from Roosevelt Av to 71 Av
Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Feb 21 - 23
Trains stop at Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.
• Please allow additional travel time.
Planned Work
[F] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Smith-9 Sts to Avenue X
Weekend, 11:45 PM Fri to 8 PM Sun, Feb 20 - 22
No Coney Island-bound service at 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park, Fort Hamilton Pkwy, Ditmas Av, Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P and Avenue U.
Travel Alternatives
For 4 Av-9 St, 15 St-Prospect Park and Fort Hamilton Pkwy, take the [G] instead. Transfer between trains at Smith-9 Sts, 7 Av or Church Av.
For service to Ditmas Av, Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P and Avenue U, take the [F] to 18 Av, Kings Hwy or Avenue X and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].
For service from these stations, take the [F] to Kings Hwy, 18 Av or Church Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [F].
Planned Work
[D] No trains between Bay Pkwy and Stillwell Av
B1, B64 and B82 buses provide alternate service Weekend, 5:30 AM to 8 PM, Sat and Sun, Feb 21 - 22
[D] service operates between 205 St and Bay Pkwy.
For direct service between Stillwell Av and Manhattan/Downtown Brooklyn, take the [F] or [Q].
Travel Alternatives[TP]
Affected StationAlternate Station/Service
Bay Pkwy [ad][D], B1 and B82
25 AvB1
Bay 50 StB64, [N] at nearby 86 St (to/from Manhattan)
Stillwell Av[ad] [F] [Q], B82 and B64
Key Transfer Stations
Bay Pkwy [ad][D], B1 and B82
Avenue X[F] and B1
Stillwell Av [ad][F] [Q], B64 and B82
Note: No [N] service between 86 St and Stillwell Av during this time.

a.b: [L] No trains between 14 St-Union Sq and 8 Av

text.div:
M14 buses provide alternate service Weekends, 11:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Feb 23
[L] service operates between Rockaway Pkwy and 14 St-Union Sq.
M14 buses make all [L] stops between 14 St-Union Sq and 8 Av.
• Transfer between [L] trains and M14 buses at 14 St-Union Sq. • Use transfer ticket for connections between M14 buses and [A] [C] trains at 8 Av-14 St or [F] trains at 6 Av-14 St.
Note: Additional overnight M14 bus service will be provided between 8 Av and 1 Av.

text.P: Due to track maintenance between Jackson Hts-Roosevelt AvÂ and Forest Hills-71 Av,Â [E], [F] and [R] trains are running with delays in both directions.

a.b: [R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from 71 Av to Queens Plaza

text.div:
Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Feb 21 - 22
Trains stop at Roosevelt Av.
For service to 67 Av, 63 Dr, Woodhaven Blvd, Grand and Elmhurst Avs, take the [R] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E], Jamaica-bound [F]* or Forest Hills-bound [R].
For service to 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46, Steinway and 36 Sts, take the [R] to Queens Plaza and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E] local or Forest Hills-bound [R].
For service from these stations, take the [E] [F]* or [R] to Roosevelt Av or 71 Av and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].
*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.
~ For late night travel at these stations, see [E] advisories.

a.b: [Q] Coney Island-bound trains run express from Prospect Park to Kings Hwy

text.div:
Weekend, 11:15 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Feb 20 - 23
Trains stop at Church Av and Newkirk Plaza.
For service to Parkside Av, Beverley, Cortelyou Rds, Avenue H, Avenue J and Avenue M, take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza or Kings Hwy and transfer to a 57 St/7 Av-bound [Q].
For service from these stations, take the [Q] to Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].
[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planningyour trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

a.b: [N] No trains between 86 St and Stillwell Av

text.div:
[F] trains and B1/B4 buses provide alternate service Weekend, 5:30 AM to 8 PM, Sat and Sun, Feb 21 - 22
[N] service operates between Ditmars Blvd and 86 St.
For direct service between Stillwell Av and Manhattan/Downtown Brooklyn, take the [F] or [Q].
Travel Alternatives[TP] B1 and B4 buses stop at 86 St [N] and Avenue X [F]. [F] trains provide connecting service between Avenue X and Stillwell Av.
• Transfer between trains and buses at 86 St and Avenue X.
Note: No [D] service between Bay Pkwy and Stillwell Av during this time.
[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planningyour trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

text.P: The following SIR St George to Tottenville trains are cancelled in both directions:
The 6:31, 7:36, 8:31, 9:36, 10:31, 11:36, 12:36 and 2:31 trains have all been cancelled for the day.

text.a: B24 and B46/B46 LTD buses detoured from the Entrance on Broadway at Washington Plz Terminal
text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, buses operate as follows:
Via Broadway Right on Roebling St into Washington Plaza.

a.b:
B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway
Junction due to construction - No stops missed

text.div:
Until further notice
Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av Into Fulton St Right on Eastern Pkwy Left on Broadway then regular route
Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

text.P: M15 and M15 SBS buses are running withÂ delays, due to crane operation on 51 St and 2 Av.
M101, M102 and M103 buses areÂ detoured, due to a vehicular accident at 57 St and Lexington Av.
Southbound: Via Lexington Av, left on 57 St, right on 2 Av, right on 42 St, left on Lexington Av and regular route .
Corresponding bus stops will be made along 2 Av.

a.b: M50 - Westbound buses rerouted from 49 St between 10 Av and 11 Av - No stops missed

text.div:

Show Reroute Details

text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, please follow directional signage to nearby temporary stop.

line.name: Babylon
line.text:
Delays
Posted: 02/21/2015 1:19PM
The 12:28PM train from Babylon due Penn at 1:44PM is operating 10 minutes late due to earlier police activity at Rockville Centre.

line.name: Port Jefferson
